dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, pitiful mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understand? You are as clueless as a newborn bird, but if you beg for knowledge, so be it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am merely curious about your world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity killed the cat, they say. Your curiosity may be your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, I swear.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words are as empty as the air in a desolate tomb. Leave now, or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you in peace, then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Your presence annoys me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I never expected to encounter such ferocity.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ferocity is all we demons know. Your surprise brings me amusement.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can see that strength is respected among your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength is indeed revered, but yours is lacking. Begone before I crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you in peace, then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Your presence annoys me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to learn, not provoke.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learning requires intellect, something you lack. Nevertheless, I shall entertain your futile attempt.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I appreciate your willingness to teach me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Appreciation is a luxury you cannot afford. I tire of this conversation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see my efforts are in vain. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed, your efforts are as futile as a flame in the rain. Leave me be.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in conversing with a creature like you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Your arrogance is unbearable. Speak or leave, coward.
Run along like the pathetic being you are. You bore me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a battle, demon!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? How amusing. Prepare to face your doom, fool.
